ComicInfo.Summary: In this issue Sho and his team must depend on their resourcefulness if they hope to escape a seemingly invulnerable opponent. After a sudden ambush, the team loses radio contact with Nina and Kesaga and finds itself captured and at the mercy of Alverez and his newly acquired Echoes. In their most desperate hour, the team is quickly running out of options and time. Another Echo issue with ASTONISHING detailed artwork! A must have for manga and anime fans.
